sense.gloss: hearing what others say, gathering information, opinions, etc., public hearing

sdata.j: ↑大阪↑↓おおさか↓の↑方言↑↓ほうげん↓は|↑聞↑↓き↓き↑取↑↓と↓り|↑難↑↓がた↓い。
sdata.e: It's hard to catch words in the Osakan dialect.

sdata.j: ↑大阪↑↓おおさか↓の↑方言↑↓ほうげん↓は|↑聞↑↓き↓き↑取↑↓と↓り|↑難↑↓がた↓い。
sdata.e: It's hard to understand the Osaka dialect.
